================================================================================
                    ‚ö° QUICK START - READ THIS FIRST ‚ö°
================================================================================

Welcome to PrintClientPro!

This folder contains EVERYTHING you need. No additional installation required!


================================================================================
                         ‚úÖ WHAT TO DO NOW
================================================================================

STEP 1: SETUP AUTO-START (Just 1 click!)
-----------------------------------------

  üëâ Double-click this file: SETUP_AUTOSTART.bat

  This will:
    ‚úì Configure Windows to start PrintClientPro on every boot
    ‚úì Verify all configuration files
    ‚úì Create startup shortcut
    ‚úì Offer to start the app immediately

  Takes only 5 seconds! ‚è±Ô∏è


STEP 2: VERIFY IT'S WORKING
----------------------------

  After running SETUP_AUTOSTART.bat:

  1. The application window will appear
  2. Check the "Connection Status" panel on the left
  3. Should show: ‚óè Connected (green)
  4. Click "üß™ Test Print" to verify printing works


STEP 3: RESTART & ENJOY
------------------------

  1. Restart your computer
  2. After login, PrintClientPro starts automatically
  3. Sits in the background, ready to print
  4. Nothing else to do! üéâ


================================================================================
                         üìÇ WHAT'S IN THIS FOLDER
================================================================================

üîß SETUP FILES (Use these):
  ‚Ä¢ SETUP_AUTOSTART.bat          ‚Üê START HERE! Setup auto-start
  ‚Ä¢ REMOVE_AUTOSTART.bat         ‚Üê Remove auto-start if needed
  ‚Ä¢ START_HERE.bat               ‚Üê Interactive menu (optional)

üì± APPLICATION:
  ‚Ä¢ PrintClientPro.exe           ‚Üê The main program
  ‚Ä¢ .env                         ‚Üê Your configuration (hidden file)

üìñ DOCUMENTATION:
  ‚Ä¢ INSTALLATION_GUIDE.txt       ‚Üê Detailed instructions
  ‚Ä¢ README_AUTOSTART.txt         ‚Üê Auto-start documentation
  ‚Ä¢ This file                    ‚Üê Quick start guide

üõ†Ô∏è TOOLS:
  ‚Ä¢ wkhtmltopdf.exe             ‚Üê PDF converter (recommended)
  ‚Ä¢ SumatraPDF.exe              ‚Üê Alternative PDF tool

üíæ DATA:
  ‚Ä¢ printer_settings.json        ‚Üê Your printer configurations
  ‚Ä¢ printer_client_gui.log       ‚Üê Application logs


================================================================================
                         ‚öôÔ∏è YOUR CURRENT SETTINGS
================================================================================

Server:      https://socket.pss.al
NIPT:        PSSTEST
Username:    printer_client
PDF Tool:    wkhtmltopdf (recommended)

To change these:
  1. Start PrintClientPro.exe
  2. Click "‚öôÔ∏è Configuration" button
  3. Edit and save


================================================================================
                         ‚ùì FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
================================================================================

Q: Do I need to install anything?
A: NO! Everything is in this folder. Just run SETUP_AUTOSTART.bat

Q: Will it start automatically after I restart my PC?
A: YES! After running SETUP_AUTOSTART.bat, it starts on every boot

Q: Can I move this folder to another location?
A: YES! But run REMOVE_AUTOSTART.bat first, move the folder,
   then run SETUP_AUTOSTART.bat in the new location

Q: How do I stop auto-start?
A: Run REMOVE_AUTOSTART.bat

Q: Where are my settings saved?
A: In the .env file in this folder (may be hidden)

Q: Can I use this on multiple computers?
A: YES! Copy this entire folder to other PCs and run SETUP_AUTOSTART.bat

Q: Do I need administrator rights?
A: Usually NO. But if SETUP_AUTOSTART.bat fails, right-click it
   and choose "Run as Administrator"


================================================================================
                         üÜò NEED HELP?
================================================================================

Problem: Setup fails
  ‚Üí Right-click SETUP_AUTOSTART.bat
  ‚Üí Choose "Run as Administrator"
  ‚Üí Try again

Problem: App doesn't connect
  ‚Üí Check .env file settings
  ‚Üí Verify internet connection
  ‚Üí Check printer_client_gui.log for errors

Problem: Printing doesn't work
  ‚Üí Make sure printer is online in Windows
  ‚Üí Try Windows test print first
  ‚Üí Check app logs

For detailed help:
  ‚Üí Read INSTALLATION_GUIDE.txt
  ‚Üí Read README_AUTOSTART.txt
  ‚Üí Check printer_client_gui.log


================================================================================
                         üìç IMPORTANT LOCATIONS
================================================================================

This folder:
  C:\Users\user\Desktop\ParidBackend\PrinterClientPro\Windows-Printer-Client\dist

After setup, startup shortcut will be here:
  %APPDATA%\Microsoft\Windows\Start Menu\Programs\Startup\PrintClientPro.lnk

To view startup folder:
  Press: Windows Key + R
  Type: shell:startup
  Press: Enter


================================================================================
                         ‚≠ê TIPS & TRICKS
================================================================================

TIP 1: Use START_HERE.bat for an interactive menu
  ‚Üí Easy access to all common tasks
  ‚Üí View config, start app, setup auto-start, etc.

TIP 2: Backup your configuration
  ‚Üí Copy .env and printer_settings.json to safe location
  ‚Üí Restore if needed

TIP 3: Multiple computers?
  ‚Üí Copy this whole folder to USB drive
  ‚Üí Transfer to other PCs
  ‚Üí Run SETUP_AUTOSTART.bat on each

TIP 4: Check connection status
  ‚Üí Open the app
  ‚Üí Look for green ‚óè in "Connection Status" panel
  ‚Üí Green = connected, Red = disconnected

TIP 5: View real-time logs
  ‚Üí Open the app
  ‚Üí Click "üìã Console Log" tab
  ‚Üí See all activity in real-time


================================================================================
                         ‚ú® YOU'RE READY!
================================================================================

Everything is configured and ready to go!

NEXT STEP:
  üëâ Double-click: SETUP_AUTOSTART.bat

That's it! PrintClientPro will handle the rest automatically.

Questions? Read INSTALLATION_GUIDE.txt for detailed information.

Happy Printing! üñ®Ô∏è‚ú®
